data.name: Frail Hearts: Versicorae Domlion Strategy Guide
data.detailed_description:
Frail Hearts' 60-page official strategy guide contains a step-to-step walkthrough of the game, detailed character and monster sheets, and a further explanation of the world’s lore.

A significant part of the guide is devoted to the description of the combat system and exploration, but also a wholesome analysis of the collectible items and equipment, the features of the heroes and their abilities. Lastly, let's not forget the secrets that the foggy city of Gris is still hiding from you!

data.short_description: Frail Hearts' 60-page official strategy guide contains a step-to-step walkthrough of the game, detailed character and monster sheets, and a further explanation of the world’s lore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo U7600
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6250
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100
